item.title: LIMONADA DE COCO 🇨🇴 This is a refreshing drink from Colombia and sooo easy to make yourself! 😋 (FYI I got metal straws now 😉). RECIPE (4-5 servings, 10min prep time): -Juice of 4 limes -zest of 2 (organic and washed) limes -4 Tbsp sugar (or more to taste
